| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1298](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1298 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

The **goat** is a [domestic](/wiki/Domestic "Domestic") animal that appears in the [Lethe patch](/wiki/Lethe_patch "Lethe patch"), [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). Like [horses](/wiki/Horse "Horse"), they can be tamed with vegetables, fruits or vegan corpses.

## Generation

Goats will usually generate hostile, and may appear in [groups](/wiki/Group "Group").

## Strategy

Goats' tendency to appear in hostile groups unlike [cows](/wiki/Cow "Cow") and [sheep](/wiki/Sheep "Sheep") make them somewhat dangerous to an unwary player. Fortunately, as herbivorous monsters they can be pacified with "people food" such as [food rations](/wiki/Food_ration "Food ration") or even [tripe rations](/wiki/Tripe_ration "Tripe ration").

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Goat\&action=edit)*

Goat

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
q goat
Difficulty 6
Attacks Head butt 2d4, Kick 1d4, Kick 1d4
q goat
Difficulty 6
Attacks

Head butt 2d4, Kick 1d4, Kick 1d4

Base level 4
Base experience 41
Speed 12
Base AC 6
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 700
Nutritional value 75
Size Medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A goat:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is herbivorous.
  • can be tamed by feeding.
  • wanders randomly.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • normally appears in small groups.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1298

The goat is a domestic animal that appears in the Lethe patch, SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM. Like horses, they can be tamed with vegetables, fruits or vegan corpses.

Generation

Goats will usually generate hostile, and may appear in groups.

Strategy

Goats' tendency to appear in hostile groups unlike cows and sheep make them somewhat dangerous to an unwary player. Fortunately, as herbivorous monsters they can be pacified with "people food" such as food rations or even tripe rations.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Goat&oldid=176158"

The '''goat''' is a [[domestic]] animal that appears in the [[Lethe patch]], [[SLASH'EM]] and [[SlashTHEM]]. Like [[horse]]s, they can be tamed with vegetables, fruits or vegan corpses.

==Generation==
Goats will usually generate hostile, and may appear in [[group]]s.

==Strategy==
Goats' tendency to appear in hostile groups unlike [[cow]]s and [[sheep]] make them somewhat dangerous to an unwary player. Fortunately, as herbivorous monsters they can be pacified with "people food" such as [[food ration]]s or even [[tripe ration]]s.
